description: Pv1  Norway Maple. Tree Height 6m and crown spread 6m1m crown reduction in width and 1m reduction in height,leaving a canopy spread of 5m and height of 5m.Pv2 - Gleditsia, 	Tree Height 6m and crown spread 5m1m crown reduction in width and 1m reduction in height,leaving a canopy spread of 5m and height of 4m.		66 	False Acacia 	Prune to clear from building and allow for 2m min clearance Tree Height 10m and crown spread 5m1m crown reduction in width leaving a canopy spread of 4m.		67	False Acacia 	Remove deadwood. Lift crown over roadside to 5.5m.Tree Height 10m and crown spread 7m.		68	False Acacia 	Remove deadwood. Lift crown over roadside to 5.5m.Tree Height 10m and crown spread 7m.		69	English Oak 	Lift crown to 5m over roadway.Tree Height 9m and crown spread 8m.		73	Black Pine 	Remove hung up branch in adjacent Yew.		75	Yew	Raise lower canopy to 5.5m over roadway.Tree Height 10m and crown spread 8m.		77	Ash	Remove defective branch. (lower minor branch over road).		78	Holly hedge	Prune hard to ensure clearance over path.		149	Yew	Remove hung up branch. 		150	Coast Redwood	Remove deadwood throughout crown. Raise / lift lower crown to 3.5m all round and 5m over path / road.Tree Height 13m and crown spread 8m.		151	Yew	Trim hard side facing road.Tree Height 7m and crown spread 7m.1m crown reduction in width leaving a canopy spread of 6m. 		152	Oak	Raise crown overhanging road to 5m above ground level. Tree Height 8m and crown spread 9m.
